analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ
hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuñca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetuñca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: … tīṇi. (Dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena tīṇi.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… vipāke cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: tīṇi dutiyam gaṇitakena tīṇi hetuyāḥ ekavīsa pe vipāke cuddasa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Dve pañhāyeva.)
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca dve pañhāya eva

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca hetuyā nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
